item.title: First Post
item.description: I was thinking about moving to Github pages for while. Cancelled my previous hosting a month ago; started using Hugo for static site generation. Here’s the first post in all its glamour.

item.title: About me
item.description: Background Linguistics Master and PhD Worked at multiple universities Got into the world of tech and finance Work Currently working for EQS

item.title: My Projects
item.description: A List of My Projects I recently started doing open-source projects. Currently, I only have one: vue-dispatched-scrollbar (demo)
